full_summary:
==========================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
-----------------------------

### Project Title:
DIAPHRAGM VALVES

### Reference Number:
PW-22-01004665

### Publication Date:
August 18, 2022

### Tender Closing Date:
September 20, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Procurement Overview**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bidders to submit proposals for the supply of diaphragm valves, as detailed below.

### Items to be Supplied:

*   60 units of Diaphragm, Actuator Valve, Special Shaped (Item 1)
*   40 units of Diaphragm, Actuator Valve, Special Shaped (Item 2)
*   8 units of Valve, Diaphragm, Stop (Item 3)
*   6 units of Valve, Diaphragm, Stop (Item 4)
*   12 units of Valve, Diaphragm, Stop (Item 5)
*   10 units of Valve, Diaphragm, Stop (Item 6)
*   30 units of Valve, Diaphragm, Stop (Item 7)
*   30 units of Valve, Diaphragm, Stop (Item 8)

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

*   Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in a foreign currency will be rejected.
*   The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This procurement is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

*   World

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

*   Nova Scotia, Canada
*   British Columbia, Canada

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

*   Department of National Defence
*   101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   Neil Trousdale, Procurement Specialist
*   Email: [neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca](mailto:neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca)
*   Phone: Not available
*
